npx hardhat compile
npx hardhat run scripts/configure-router.cjs --network mainnet
update-env.bat
powershell -Command "(Get-Content .env.local) -replace 'NEXT_PUBLIC_SHAHSWAP_ORACLE=.*', 'NEXT_PUBLIC_SHAHSWAP_ORACLE=0xDB4b7d4af3f0A8c0722719023c0303CA2a9BBa52' | Set-Content .env.local"
type shahswap-deployment.json
Get-Content shahswap-deployment.json
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-router.cjs --network mainnet
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-with-gas.cjs --network localhost
node --version
npx hardhat run scripts/diagnose.cjs --network mainnet
npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-simple.cjs --network mainnet
node --version
npx hardhat run scripts/deployShahSwapUpgrades.cjs --network mainnet
taskkill /F /IM node.exe
npx hardhat run scripts/test-signer.cjs --network localhost
npx hardhat run scripts/test-signer.cjs --network mainnet
